description
======================
Zero Gravity is the official continuation issued in 2006, arcade Sonic Riders . Like the first part , we take part in unusual races, taking control over some of their heroes Sonic games in the series , including the title , likeable hedgehog . General assumptions of the game remained virtually unchanged . All involved in racing form to move using quite specifically designed jet boards , which are able to perform , inter alia, effective returns.

For the preparation of the game described is responsible Sonic Team . In contrast to the first part of which was spent on the PC and the three consoles , in case of the continuation was ensured only by holders of two platforms , namely PlayStation 2 and Wii. The differences between these versions are small. They concern the details of the implementation of graphics and applied control .

As has been said , we participate in an extremely dynamic races played interestingly designed routes. In this sequel ensured among other things, changes in the manipulation of gravity. As a result of the game , a number of completely new maneuvers , which during the race can be used . These include, inter alia, the movement of the wall or detachment from the substrate in order to quickly overcome the bend or relapse. In addition, some games are now played in space , which is of course a remarkable impact on the further development of events .

Controlled characters can also now use the new upgrades , so in a simpler way the lead . The game appeared addition, new models of boards, which grows fun you can improve . The player can also play as some brand new characters.

Visuals Zero Gravity presents a slightly higher level of performance from the first part of the series. Improvements covered both the appearance of the surroundings , as well as on the route form .
